The Crossings project involves the design of 359 multi-family units over 8 total buildings with a small Clubhouse and pool amenity space. There are three types of multi-family buildings (R-2 Occupancy, Type VA Construction, fully sprinklered - NFPA 13R). “Building Type 1” is an “L” shaped four-story building with an elevator; “Building Type 2” is a three-story building with conditioned corridors (no elevator); and “Building Type 3” is a three-story building (no elevator) with conditioned corridors and “tuck-under” garages. “Building Type 1” has 5 Live work units at the ground floor that could be used for office/retail spaces combined with living space or just as typical apartments. A secondary deck that is tiered down from the first that will not be covered, approx. 261sqft. There will be a fireplace at the northern edge of the cover with chimney that extends above the proposed gable cover, it will be no less than 10ft from home and will maintain roofing offset of 3 ft from highest pitch. There will be a natural gas igniter system installed.
